website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking an adjustable sun hat with colorful options should check out this classic pick.
pros: Head strap and chin strap are adjustable so you can find the perfect fit
Color options available for both boys and girls
cons: Some customers have issues with the chin strap breaking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coverage from the sun
customer_reviews.text: Perfect coverage from the sun. The brim is strong and doesn't flip over even from a bit of wind. Second one on its way! My daughter is 22 months and we bought the 2-8 years old size.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little sun hat
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for in a water friendly sun hat. Lightweight, the brim stays sturdy when wet, provides great coverage, and the adjustability is great. Once tightened, my baby can't get it off so she gives up and forgets about it. The brim ripples a little in the back when the head is adjusted to the smaller end, but this does not affect the coverage or visibility.
customer_reviews.author: Reh

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY hat you'll really need!
customer_reviews.text: This hate is AMAZING in so many ways. First of all, a hat that can truly grow with your child is just wonderful. It's lightweight and breathes nicely. My son's head gets a little sweaty where it cinches, but otherwise it's comfortable. It provides maximum coverage for the face, ears, and neck. The cinch around the head provides a perfect fit for little noggins and the chin strap keeps it in place. My kiddo never complains about having this hat on. If your child is going through the hat pulling phase, note that the chin strap just snap off on one side if they pull hard enough.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Little small
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. 1 in 0-6 for my baby and it fits her great. She has a little head and this will last her a while. The other one that I bought was in 2-8 for my 2.5yo. He does have a larger head but this hat will not last him longer than the summer. I was hoping to get a couple years out of it but it’s snug on his head without needing to tighten the bungee strap. I wish I had sized up for him.
customer_reviews.author: L.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Minor quality issues but a nice sun hat.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality fabric, but the seam holding the anti-choke piece to the chin strap ripped the first time I gave it a yank to test it. I sewed it back up because it was easier than returning it and getting a new hat, but disappointing for such a premium hat. Strap keeps it on her head, provided she allows it to stay. Love the bright yellow, easy to find her when she decides to tear off in a random direction. My 22 month old wears the 2-8y with room to spare, but she has a big 95th percentile noggin, so I’d say they run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: wildebeest

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for an upcoming beach trip and just general summer sun protection. My baby is 2.5 months old, for the majority of use will be 4+ months and I ordered 0-6mo size. Thank goodness for the adjustable clip otherwise would be much too large. I think the clip and brim in the back prevents baby from resting his head back. Loved the yellow color but my son looks like the man from curious George and not like he’s wearing a sun hat, still as cute as ever! The wide brim is great for protecting him front and back, provides more protection than some regular bucket sun hats! Hoping it will hold up when it gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Garvick

customer_reviews.title: Good hat, after easy adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Got this nice hat for my wife, actually. No, not a child bride. Just happens that she has a small head for an adult. It's very hard to find a hat in her size, which is a bit smaller than the smallest official adult size. Her hats, when she can find any, come from the kids' rack. This one luckily has n size-adjustment band, so when it surprisingly turned out to have a larger-than-expected crown, she could compensate for that. Now the hat fits comfortably around her forehead though the crown still looks about a half-inch too big for her all around. Otherwise, this is a nice, well-made hat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantico

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this hat!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is quite the particular one, everything has to be just right-seams, fabric, accessories, etc. I love the SwimZip company and was intrigued by other reviewers' comments about this hat. They couldn't have been more right! This hat packs super well (takes a little smoothing out, but not terrible by any means) and, most importantly, the brim stays up no matter what! All the time! Revolutionary as far as wide brim hats for children go. And even better, my daughter loves it and will actually wear it. Super adjustable and anticipate she'll have a few more years out of it - she's almost 3 and I got the "2-8 years" size. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Malissa Parker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality kids hat
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat. It fits my two year old very well and it seems like it will continue to fit for several years since there is a drawstring to make it smaller/larger. The brim is rigid and holds its flat shape to block the sun. It is a wide brim too. There are little vents on the side to allow air flow. The string around the neck is nice to hold the hat in place. There are little clips that allow the neck string to be taken off which my son sometimes puts out of place, but they are easy to clip back in. Overall a great hat.
customer_reviews.author: K. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my 1 yr old and am satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 1 yr old and am satisfied with the product. In general, very well made, great quality and fits well. If I have any quibble, it's the tiny locking mechanism on the chin strap that seems to slide free too easily, making pulling it off and tossing it away....well, child's play. I'm not even sure why it's there, because it just provides the opportunity for the hat to be yanked out even after the strap has been tightened. But hopefully my son won't figure that out for a long while! In every other way, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sun hat, especially for kids with a large head! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sun hat. My 3-year old has always had a 99th percentile head, and it's challenging to buy hats that will be big enough. The 2-8yr size isn't too big for her--I just tightened the adjustable strap around the head portion...so great because it means we have room to grow without having to buy a new hat! I also LOVE the design of the chin strap. Other hats where you have to tie two ties together under their chin...well, they rarely stay tied and my kid doesn't really want to sit there while I tie them! This hat may be a few dollars more than others but it is DEFINITELY worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this little hat. The head width is adjustable so that it fits smaller heads. I was able to fit it perfectly on my 2 month old, and it could go even smaller, although the adjustable strap, when making the hat smaller, makes the hat look more like a cowboy hat because the side flaps up. The chin drawstring strap helps to hold the hat in place incase of wind and is easy to tighten or loosen with one hand. Perfect for strolls in the sun or at the beach for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why this hs so many good reviews when there is a better and cheaper option on amazon. My white hat came a bit dirty as if it had already been worn. Then I happen to look at the tag to see if I could wash it first and it says “HAND WASH” 🙄 seriously? Who wants to hand wash a kids hat after it’s been played in for ours after the beach? Hard pass. It is very sturdy which I like (hence 2 stars) but which also makes it harder to pack. There is a cheaper and just as nice version elsewhere on amazon. Plus the hand wash was a deal breaker, coupled with it arriving dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Not for tiny babies
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 month old, not realizing that the wide brim is very rigid and does not bend back. She cannot wear it at this time because of that, since she has to be in her stroller or held, and when the brim gets bumped or "folded" the hat goes with it and it doesn't stay on. Should work better when she can sit on her own and the brim doesn't have to be touched
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap China Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Pulled on the strap to adjust it onto my baby’s head the FIRST time she ever tried to wear it-and the cheap plastic clasp broke. Typical made in china garbage. Should have known better.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality that won’t last
customer_reviews.text: This hat looked great and had good reviews, but I don’t think it’ll last. On the first wear of it the adjustment string on the back broke loose and can’t be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hat!
customer_reviews.text: Great hat! I haven’t had a chance to test it out in the water yet. The size is very adjustable. It fits my 16 month old, and my 4 year old well when cinched up, and there is plenty of room to grow. The brim feels sturdy so I don’t anticipate it flopping down into his face when it gets wet. We have some other pricier hats that we can’t really use, because they just hang down on the face the moment they get wet (and before they get wet if we are being honest!) The chin strap keeps it in place, but it has the anti choke feature so I don’t have to worry.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for boat rides and naps!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hat. Got it for my 8mth son. I wanted a hat that he could use on the boat without falling off. I love the bungee cord that lets you adjust it to the head size. The chin strap has a great safety feature of a quick release so I don't have to worry about him getting choked. I'm also able to adjust the chin strap so it doesn't fly off. He doesn't try to pull it off either. The hat holds its shape well and I fold up the back bring so he can wear it with his life jacket.
customer_reviews.author: A. Trusty Southern Lady

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: The cord is not completely detachable. My son will wear It only if the cord isn’t there. I think the cord is a trigger for him that he’s wearing a hat so once he realizes he rips it off. I also thought the fit was very snug!! My kid is in the low percentile too. I think more diversity in sizes would probably fix this. I did like the light weight and sun coverage though. We needed a hat with a sturdier brim and this fits the bill as long as you can convince your kiddo to keep it on
customer_reviews.author: Mel RC

customer_reviews.title: A hat for all summer long!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the recommendation of a mom friend and haven't been disappointed! Our son would pull off every hat he wore. But now he asks for "hat" before we go out the door. I think the comfort of this hat is a big reason why. --The brim is firm so it doesn't block vision --The strap ensures hat stays on, but also comes undone under pressure (a safety feature to prevent strangulation) -floats! -wide brim prevents sunburn Also - it says hand wash only, however, we washed in our washer's "hand wash" cycle in a delicates bag and it removed a lot of the grime that had built up over a summer of wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cute color, waterproof, but weird shape and fit
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute hat, I like that it’s adjustable for multiple ages and head sizes and waterproof. The reason I’m not giving it 5 stars is that fits weirdly on my daughter’s head, it just looks strange with the band tightented for her (she’s 4yo). She also tells me it’s not that comfy and usually refuses to wear it (she hasn’t minded other hats in the past). Also, the string ripped in the spot where it’s sewn to the plastic part almost right away and I had to fix it. I wish I spent the extra $10-$15 and gone with the brand I know I like.
customer_reviews.author: Nadi

customer_reviews.title: Great cover and love that it can be sized accordingly
customer_reviews.text: This is the only hat my boys will not take off. I love that I can use the strap to keep the hat on. It snaps away easily should they give it a good yank though. That's great for choking hazard. This works for both of my boys. They are 17 months old and one has a head in the 99th percentile, so he's a bobble head. The other one has a "normal" sized head, but it's nice that we can make it tighter. Their hair isn't all sweaty after wearing this hat, which is a definite plus here in Arizona.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Arizonian

customer_reviews.title: Chin strap broke day 1!
customer_reviews.text: Kid wore it once and the chin strap came out of where it was sewn in! Already have it labeled for daycare so now I need to dig out a needle and thread and try to repair it. For this price I expect a durable product. Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy_Pants_Rants

customer_reviews.title: Beach and pool approved
customer_reviews.text: Love the wide brim and how adjustable it is, including in the crown. Though I purchased this for someone in the 2-8 year range, I opted for the 8-14 size due to a larger head. I am pleased at how easy this hat is to adjust for head size. We have not tried this out for swimming yet, but the hat feels like high quality, and I expect it will do well. UPDATE: This hat is awesome. It was perfect for our beach trip. Love how easy it is to adjust and how the wide brim holds its shape even when wet. Beach and pool approved.
customer_reviews.author: Ryah

customer_reviews.title: We've been buying these for years.
customer_reviews.text: These are THE BEST SUN HATS! I ordered our first one when my son was an infant. My daughter and sun wear these in the ocean, at the pool, hiking in the woods . . . They adjust snugly, grow with the child, the strap actually stays clasped, and they are long lived. Great coverage to protect face and neck from the sun. The vents help keep them from getting too sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Strosnider

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, holds its shape, flexible
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat for my baby! The hat itself was too big for my 3 month old, but with the size adjuster it fits perfect. It’s snug enough to stay in place but not too tight that it leaves an indentation on his little head. The brim is rigid but flexible at the same time holding its shape. It’s light weight and doesn’t get too hot on his head. Plus the color is cute and everyone comments on his little sun hat!
customer_reviews.author: Katey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to provide good sun protection, stays on my daughter's head and she says it is comfortable. Very lightweight. Love the mint green color. When I ordered it the rim looked dark gray and the hat green and I got all green which I w DED up liking but not sure why it was different than shown. Overall though seems like a great hat although we've only had it a week.
customer_reviews.author: ChampagneMango924

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable, but run small & hot material
customer_reviews.text: Well-made hat I purchased because of the adjustable hat band. Two things to note. This hat runs small. I purchased it for my granddaughter who is five and the hat band does not to be cinched in. There is no way it’s going to fit her next year, much less when she is eight years old! The other thing to note is that even though it’s vented, the polyester makes it hot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but regret color choice
customer_reviews.text: This hat is okay. I give it 4 stars because it does do the job of giving good shade to my toddlers face & neck. But I wasn’t happy with the color choices , they all seemed too light, so I thought maybe to go bold and order orange - well it’s VERY orange , like almost neon. Don’t love the color. Also my 16 month old can easily pull the chin strap off because of the choking prevention which yes I’m thankful for but I also wanted a hat that he couldn’t take off. But he’s getting more used to it. It stays clean easily and dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: Derek F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!! So disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to get this hat for our 17 month old. It fit her great and blocked the sun well. But, it didn’t even last 1 full week before breaking!! Grrrrr. The strap came unsewn causing the clip piece to fall off and get lost, so now we have a strap hanging from one side and our only choice is to cut it off. We will likely end up not using the hat because, without the strap, it blows off her head easily. Very disappointed in the quality and $20 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swim hat
customer_reviews.text: Last year I bought the iplay hat for my 2 year old, but it would flop into his eyes when it got wet. This hat is awesome! It maintains it’s shape when wet, it’s lightweight, looks good, and I like the adjustable chin strap which can easily break away to prevent strangulation. I love this UV swim hat and will plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST sun hat for littles!!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST!! We tried several and this hat by FAR was the best fit. Everything about it makes sense, so easy to adjust and the brim stays put so it doesn’t bother your baby. I don’t know what we would have done all summer without this protective hat for our son! Definitely will be a gift I give to friends/family members with babies/toddlers
customer_reviews.author: Amanda May

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hat. I bought it for my 13month old girl, who is skinny for her age but tall. I love that it's adjustable so it will last for a few years. The brim is the perfect size to keep the sun away from her face and neck. She doesn't mind wearing it and it does NOT flop when wet. We use it swimming all the time! I thought I had lost it a few weeks ago and was devastated... But luckily we found it. I will definitely be purchasing another one in case we do lose the first one!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Geil

customer_reviews.title: they are great! They're very fast drying
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my kids (blue and pink), they are great! They're very fast drying, which is nice and they maintain their shape. We got these mostly for the pool but now they wear them when we are out in the sun during the day as well. My 6 year old has a giant hat (usually need to buy adult sized head gear) but this fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Silvie

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: This hat works well for my 4 year old. Surprisingly, it fits her just right without me having to adjust the size of the hat. I was hoping it would be a bit larger so that she can grow into it. I think come next summer she will definitely grow out of this hat. She does not have an overly large head either for her age.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 3 weeks and then today the cord used to tighten it around the head broke off from one side. Twenty dollars wasted! Update: Thanks to amazon policy I was able to return the cap, so did not actually waste my money. The company also reached out to me but by then I had already returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: ZeroCool

customer_reviews.title: Lots of shade for the little one
customer_reviews.text: I and my 1.5 year old love this hat! I bought the next size up so she could grow into it. The adjustable head strap makes the hat small enough to fit her head right now and and will expand as she grows. The chin strap is easy to use/adjust and stays put and keeps the hat on her head. The brim of the hat is a little stiffer than most other sun hats so it sticks out straight all around her head giving her head, face, neck, and shoulders shade. She wears it with no fuss. She seems comfortable in it and it doesn't get in her way or block her view. Great hat!
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love that the string around the head is adjustable as baby grows! And the string to hold hat on is adjustable too with plenty of room to go loose or tight. So far the brim stays in place and doesn’t droop but we have only used it for walks to protect my baby’s head and eyes from the sun! We plan on using in the pool and ocean this summer so we’ll see how it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Curtis

customer_reviews.title: the best!
customer_reviews.text: I adore these days. I used them for my one year old and sometimes my 5 year old if we're going to be outside a lot. The wear and wash well. I have washed them several times and they come out looking brand new. My one year old leaves it on and it fits him well. I love know that these hats protect them from the sun. I bought the yellow and light blue version in the 4-8 year old size and they fit both of my children.
customer_reviews.author: leslie grace

customer_reviews.title: Nice features and pretty color choices
customer_reviews.text: I think this sun hat is adorable. I can’t wait until it fits my baby well. It does have a draw string that allows you to snug up the hat around the head which is helpful but obviously it still looks a little silly on smaller babies. I just prop it over my 2 month old while I’m baby wearing him so he doesn’t get a sun burn on the top of his head. But, I know he’ll grow into it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mallery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any baby-adjustable and stays on well!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this hat! The wide brim helps protect our babies face from the sun and the drawstring around the head helps it to fit a variety of head sizes! (Our 4 month old wears it often, and then we let his cousin borrow it who is 1 with a larger than normal head! It fit both of them perfectly thanks to the drawstring!) The tie around the neck is also perfect and it keeps them from pulling it off!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Cox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hat for keeping son off 4-year old
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hat for my 4-year old son. It is cuter than I expected and really keeps the sun off his face and the front and back of his neck, which is exactly what I wanted it for when we are in the sun so often in the summer. I had to search for a while to find this hat, but I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Trice

customer_reviews.title: GREAT hat!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this hat! I had a hard time getting my daughter to keep her other sun hat on (with the flaps that cover the side/back of the neck), but she tolerates this one way more. She cord in the back that tightens the hat works really well. I'm extremely pleased with this purchase. The hat itself is of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little hat for my baby. Keeps the sun off, stays on really well (lots of adjusters to make sure it’s the right fit), and baby loves playing with the chin strap lol. We got the yellow and it is so adorable! Plus it’s quick and easy to find in her diaper bag or stroller with its bright color. Definitely a great buy for us.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjust-ability and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this hat! It defiantly feels like quality as the brim is thick & the mesh on the inside is nice to keep baby cool. I love the abilty to tighten the hat on my little one as right now its a tad too big for him. The chin strap feels nice and keeps the hat on my little guy as he currently likes to rip hats off his head. The chin straps are removable though, which is nice if our little guy ever just gives in & deals with wearing a hat.
customer_reviews.author: Sami Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit; but hot
customer_reviews.text: This fit, sun protection, and 13 month old compliance with wearing is great. I noticed he got a little hot with it though. It could have just been due to it being very hot outside too. Its a great hat though. He wore it at the water park 4 hours without any burn. So cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley n Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well to every-day use and washing
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this hat. The head circumference and chin straps are adjustable, so her hat never blows off her head on a windy day. The shape holds-up well in the ocean, pool, and washing machine. There’s a “breakaway snap” on the chin strap for added safety. This hat gets almost daily use in the summer and is washed quite a bit — and it’s still in great condition. For reference, my daughter is 1.5 yes old, but since she has a big head, we got size 2-8.
customer_reviews.author: DCTXJenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: I just had six skin cancers removed and definitely want to protect the skin of my very fair complexioned granddaughter. My dermatologist recommended wearing a wide brim hat for sun protection. So, I got this hat for my three year old granddaughter. She wears it to the waterpark, pool and beach with a rash guard swim shirt and lots of sun screen. I am very happy with the hat and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie Lee Pittman

customer_reviews.title: it grows with the kid, avoiding the need for a new hat every year
customer_reviews.text: We love these hats for the beach and pool. The brim is sturdy so doesn’t flop down (which has annoyed my daughter immensely in the past from other hats) and I love that it has a strap under the chin (with a “lock” to tighten it as needed) to keep it in place on windy days, as well as the option to make it bigger and smaller around the head, so we don’t have to buy a new one every summer!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Hat
customer_reviews.text: My little one LOVES their hat. It keeps its shape very well with a rambunctious child. Handles water well. Can't speak on sun protection as far as SPF but it is wide enough to cover the face and neck. Have purchased multiple hats in different colors and sizes as my child has gotten older.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerT

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good choice for sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: We finally were able to use this hat with our 6 month old and it was a total success! The hat provided great sun coverage even when wet. It fit so comfortable that our little one left it alone and hardly seemed to notice she was wearing it. The beach was a little windy at points and the hat stayed put very well. This is a very good choice for sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Paige P.

customer_reviews.title: Would repurchase
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage, brim is rigid enough to not droop in eyes (even wet) but floppy enough to pack easily. My 2.5 yo is on the larger end of the small size and it fits well enough that we dont need to tighten it unless it is windy or we are on a boat. An avg to stong toddler can pull it off/release the quick release if they are specifically trying to get the hat off but it will stay on/latched even during swimming or vigorous play. Cleans up as well as anything but if you don't want it to show any dirt or stains then probably get a dark color.
customer_reviews.author: David Badger

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: This hat is huge and really annoying to adjust. Maybe when my baby gets bigger it'll be better, but it's not as adjustable as it claims to be. (My 2.5 month old is in the 50th %ile for head size, so exactly average.) This hat should probably be 4+ months at least.
customer_reviews.author: Sometimes I buy things

customer_reviews.title: Well made, not floppy
customer_reviews.text: I like this hat because the brim is not overly floppy. Doesn’t obstruct view and is very well made. The hat is not super deep, so even if it’s a little too big it won’t end up slipping down too far. I ordered the 2-8 for my average headed 6 year old daughter and the bigger one for my large headed 6 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Beata

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy sun hat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat! I ordered the 12-24 month size for my 16 month old daughter and it fits her (big) head with plenty of room to grow! My 2.5 year old fits the 2-8 year size really well. They are sturdy, provide great coverage, are perfect for the water, and look so cute on the kids. I love that the chin strap has a detach clip feature that breaks free when pulled on, or else my littles would’ve broken them on day one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bender

customer_reviews.title: Best sun hat
customer_reviews.text: These hats are awesome! I purchased several for my kids-one for home and one for daycare for each. Bright colors make children easy to spot, my children don't try to pull it off often. It has a nice safety release if the child should become stuck, and the under chin strap is easily adjustable. No ties makes this hat quick to put on and take off. Excellent coverage from the sun. For reference, I purchased the 2-8 size for my children over 1 yr. I recommend this hat every chance I get.
customer_reviews.author: Noname

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my 9 month old today as we were putzing around in the backyard and she looked like a little dandelion! Super light weight and breathable. Very soft material. I was worried the brim would be too wide but since the fabric is so soft she can comfortably crush the back of the brim while sitting in the stroller and still be totally covered by the rest of it. And she doesn't mind wearing it, which is amazing because she usually hates hats. Totally crushable, able to shove it down in the diaper bag and it pops right back into place. Really happy with this hat. You should get it!
customer_reviews.author: Dogmar

customer_reviews.title: I love this hat!
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute. It provides SO MUCH shade for my daughter. We took her to the beach in Grand Cayman and it was like her whole (1 yr 4 mos) body was in shade while wearing this hat. She has never been sunburned while in this hat. When she was younger she was not able to pull it off. However, now that she is 22 months she can pull the safety clippy thing apart and get it off her head. Alas. They tend to outsmart you on everything sooner or later.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A Fetterman

customer_reviews.title: Structured and adjustable!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best hats. I love that they are structured. I bought the 6-24 mo size for my one year old and there is room to grow. The fact that it is adjustable around the head and chin won me over. Plus, it comes in great colors. We’ve gotten these wet and they dry quickly and return to shape even after wringing them out.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love. I would recommend it to any of my mom friends
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I would recommend it to any of my mom friends. It is a little more thank other hats but worth it. Lots of other hats flipped forward and would cause my kiddo to stumble. This one is stiffer and stays out well. Keeps the sun out of her face
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This hat is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat. I bought it for my six month old and there is plenty of room for her to grow into it. It fits snugly once you adjust the band on the hat. The hat itself is not floppy at all, even when wet, so it doesn't get in her face. My favorite part is that there is a breakway clasp on the neck band.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Best toddler sunhat
customer_reviews.text: This is the only hat we have found that 1) my 16 month old doesn’t rip off in under 2 minutes and 2) has a stiff enough brim to not just flop down. Great sun protection and is holding up through multiple washings. Recommend to all my mom friends with toddlers
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn KSG

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection that won't overheat your tot
customer_reviews.text: This hat breathes well so my kid's head doesn't get as sweaty in the heat as it does with other hats. I love that it's a bit adjustable so we've gotten more than one summer of use out of it as we've gone from baby to toddler. The under the chin strap is great and I appreciate the safety feature of it being able to unclasp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby keeps taking it off his head...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work for our 11 month old spirited baby. He pulls it off his head every time I put it in him because the straps have a breakaway. We had to get a different hat that tied underneath his chin. Otherwise the hat is great for sun protection and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hats
customer_reviews.text: This hats work great for little kids I have a 4 yr old boy and 7 yr old girl fits as expected cute colors the latch release is annoying in that it un- clips to easy very effective to keep sun off face and neck area in the sun they like them
customer_reviews.author: Chris OToole

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our camping trip to keep my babys face and head protected from the sun. It fit him great, and it’s adjustable so I liked that. Also it’s lightweight and breathable. We also used this hat for the pool/water and beach. The brim doesn’t go flat which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hat
customer_reviews.text: This has all the features I wanted in a sub hat. The band is adjustable. It cinched small enough for my 16-month old. And it looks like it will fit her for years. I also really like how the chin strap cinches. It’s more adjustable than Velcro and faster than tying. The anti-choking feature is a nice touch too. It’s a bit more yellow irl, but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carman

customer_reviews.title: Great Hat But Avoid Getting Wet If You Want Longevity
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased three of these hats for my kids. Overall I love the colors, adjustability, quick dry capability, and sun protection they provide. My only con and the reason it’s not getting five stars is that over time, the brim has become quite floppy. I assume this is from getting wet so much. Nevertheless, I would purchase more - just try to keep them dry!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer hat for baby!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sweet little redhead with very fair skin. I bought the white hat last year for her first summer, and I loved it so much that I bought another one this year. This year I bought the pink one. The hat is lightweight and cute. My little one is 19 months old, so I bought the size 6-24 months. It fits great with a little room to grow. Love this hat!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: we bought a more expensive one for the kids a year ago and the brim just became totally floppy when wet. This one is cheaper and does a much better job of holding its shape. Have washed it multiple times and it looks just like new
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: cheap snap on chin strap
customer_reviews.text: This hat was just what I was looking for and totally protected my 5 yo daughter's face from the sun while at the beach. My only compliant, and this is a big one, is that the snap on the chin strap keep coming undone. When we were at the beach the wind would pick up and cause the snap to come undone. While at the pool m daughter likes to swim in her hat and this hat held up well due to the wire on the brim however the snap kept coming undone. Would recommend for younger kids that don't swim under water or if you're not going to the beach where there could be stronger winds.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Good hat but brim is too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Love the hat except it’s impossible to hold my son without having the brim poke me in the face constantly. The brim is stiffer than I’d like. I wanted to buy a second hat for daycare but sadly it will not be a SwimZip.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: The hat has an adjustable strap around the chin and ...
customer_reviews.text: The hat has an adjustable strap around the chin and the hat itself. I got it for my 14 month old daughter and she doesn't care for hats or anything on her head period. But she kept this on for our local egg hunt so that's a win in our book.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable hat
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this hat for my 18 mo granddaughter in the 2-8 size. It fits perfect because if the adjustable feature. She wears it without trying to take it off. She has very fair skin and this hat has great protection features.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Great sun hat for water play!
customer_reviews.text: We love this hat - worked great at the splash pad and beach and did not wilt under heat, humidity, and multiple splashes! The baby did rip it off repeatedly, but that's not really a hat malfunction, just a 9-month-old being a 9-month-old. She did leave it on once the glare from the sand and sun started to bother her without it. No sun damage at all to our little one!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie R.

customer_reviews.title: Rip in rim
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 2 stars because after reading all the reviews I was so excited to get it I took it out of the package so excited looked around it and found that huge rip i was crushed!!!! It fit my daughter and is precious so I am returning it and hoping to get another one in before we go to the beach and then I'll update my review!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Pate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these hats so our preschoolers could bake in the sun while attending a college graduation. The material is similar to a bathing suit and is waterproof. The strap was great, and the white color looked dressy with what they were wearing (I don’t think it looked like a swim hat.) Overall a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JEG

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out and well made
customer_reviews.text: This hat made pool time so much more fun. No worries about the sun in my grandson's face, or the hat getting wet. It held up well when it did get wet. It hits the mark perfectly between stiff enough to hold it's shape and soft enough to be comfortable when leaning back against something. Must have been comfortable to wear because my 14 mo. old grandson never tried to take it off. The breakaway strap is great. Highly recommend this hat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jakubowski

customer_reviews.title: Very nice , functional , cute hat on my toddler
customer_reviews.text: This hat is a must-have !!! and it can be adjusted according to your kid's head size ( which is amazing, nice design ) It ]provides full coverage and sun protection when my toddler is out and about. I can't tell whether my toddler loves it or not, but I certainly do :)
customer_reviews.author: Jzing

customer_reviews.title: Very nice wide brimmed hat.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute sun hat for my toddler. Purchased for a trip to Florida. He remarkably kept the hat on and actually seemed to like it. Appears wide brimmed and provides good sun protection for my child. The color is a nice bright yellow, somewhere between lemon and mustard. Great quality, appears well made. Would recommend for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Comme La Lune

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, light weight, folds easily!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great hat for my two year old grandson, the brim is very wide, the hat fits comfortably on his head, and stays in place. Great material you can fold it for storage. I would order this again, or recommend it to a friend. Update after really using this hat, I realize it becomes detached super easily, I am constantly resnapping it.
customer_reviews.author: Syndel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sun hat for growing kids
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hat! Made of fabric that dries quickly, and it's adjustable to fit your child's head circumference, as well as having a strong, adjustable chin strap for windy days. Plus, the brim is wide enough to give real sun protection, even on the tip of the nose. It is great for my 10 year old and will fit her for at least a few years. I love these hats
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Milne

customer_reviews.title: Sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I got each of my boys a SwimZip hat to protect them from the sun this summer. We are a very fair skinned family and I want to provide as much protection as I can for my kids.. The hats fit them perfect! Plus they liked they can wear them in the pool! I loved this for two reasons, 1. It kept their heads, neck, and faces protected from damaging sun rays, and 2. The bright colors made it easy to keep track of them in the pool! Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda_R

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this hat!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is exactly what I’ve been looking for! I ordered the mint color in size 2-8 for my 3 year old daughter. It fits perfectly and seems like it will for quite a while because of the adjustment feature. Also love that the brim stays sturdy, even when wet. She dunked the front of her hat in the pool a few times and it didn’t sag at all. + SPF 50, break-away on the chin strap, & it’s adorable! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: You need this hat for your kid!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kids. I ordered the red color in the 6-24 month size for my 10 month old and the 3-8 year size for my 3 year old. Both are a little big but are easily adjusted with the bungie on the back. The hats maintain their shape well when wet and dry quickly. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Allyn D.

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable hat- holds up when swimming
customer_reviews.text: These hats are great. I got one for my daughter (15months) and one for my son. I got the size 2-8 for both of them and just tighten the back strap as needed. It does bunch up quite a bit, but as expected when you are cinching something tight. Some other reviews asked how the hold up when wet. So far they have been great. My kids wear them swimming and the brim doesn’t flop over. Chin strap with safety “break” point is great.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from a week at the beach and this last minute purchase proved just what my boys (23 mo and ~3.5 yo) needed. They were lightweight, cool (mesh vent), comfortable (surprisingly kept them on as they do not typically like wearing hats), 100% adjustable as mentioned with a neck strap and a strap around the circumference of their heads, and the safety strap was utilized by my youngest who attempted to rip it off a couple times after we had snuggly adjusted the neck strap. Very satisfied with our purchase that appears to have plenty of room to grow with them! Happy to support a survivor who used her story for something great!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Nee-haw!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is awesome! We took it for my fairskinned 3 y/o grandson on a beach trip. The brim is wide enough to protect his face & neck. It fits well and the strap keeps it in place on a windy beach. Best of all, he liked it and didn't keep trying to take it off. Actually he thought it was a cowboy hat and kept yelling "Nee-haw!" Well worth the price. My daughter wished she had let me buy one for her little girl.
customer_reviews.author: foreverfilly

customer_reviews.title: Great hat
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage for my son's face and neck. Depending on his mood, he likes to tug the hat off, so having the snap feature on the tie is great because it won't pinch his skin. Great hat overall.
customer_reviews.author: LaMi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bill, Lightweight, Adjustable Chin Strap
customer_reviews.text: The hat was much nicer than expected with a sturdy bill that will not flop and will keep the sun off my toddler. Love the chin strap that easily adjusts and how lightweight the material is on the hat. This is a great hat that I'm sure we'll get several years of use out of!
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: its really cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it is so adjustable and will last her for a long time -we have not tried for vert long yet but she kept it on for over an hour yesterday the brim shades her whole face!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Macdougall

customer_reviews.title: Sun hat for three year old girl
customer_reviews.text: Nice hat that stays on. You can pull the string as tight or loose as you want. I wish the pink was a darker color pink though because it will look dirty fast, but it's a cute hat. There is mesh on the inside of the hat that has a cheap feel and not up to my high expectations, but I still like the hat. The girl is 3 years 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Hbste1

customer_reviews.title: Runs extremely small
customer_reviews.text: My son is well within the age range for the hat. There was NO way this hat was going to fit him. It would probably fit my 3 year old nephew better.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My baby has been using since he was 3 months and the cool feature is that you can adjust it. Really good material! Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice hat
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved so haven't had a chance to try. I am a small adult and the 8-14 years old version fits fine. Seems to be well made and look forward to wearing. Am giving it 4 stars because I don't know how well it will be in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Huiet

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: Fits my daughter well and will fit for years to come! There is a strap above the rim (around the head) where you can tighten or loosen so it can fit for more then one summer. It is the only hat my daughter doesn't pull off. Its durable and made welland! And most of all, it so cute on!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: They worked great! Good quality hats
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 hats for my daughters for vacation in Cancun. They worked great! Good quality hats, stayed on while in and out of the water. Protected my daughter's face and scalp from sun burns. I would highly recommend! I bought a 2-8 years size for my 6 year old and 8-14 years size for my 9 year old. The fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Esther Rios

customer_reviews.title: Out in the sun with style
customer_reviews.text: Nice sun hat. My granddaughter will be able to wear this hat for a few years since it’s adjustable. It’s well made and comfortable since she does like to wear it whenever she’s out there. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Babychick

customer_reviews.title: Poor material quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice hat at first but the quality shows after a few wears. Also seems to be mold or something growing between the fabric on the rim. Overall the fit is as expected but very disappointed in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I can't get over how perfect this hat is! It didn't disappoint! Pros: Brim holds up, even when wet Easy to wash Quick to dry Easy to adjust to baby's head for snug fit Baby can't pull off (yay!) Breathable/Comfortable Super cute/beautiful color Cons: None yet!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

product_meta.title: SwimZip Kid's Sun Hat - Wide Brim UPF 50+ Protection Hat for Baby, Toddler, Kids
feature_bullets: BUILT-IN SUN PROTECTION - SwimZip's built-in sun protection blocks 98% of all UVA and UVB cancer causing rays. No more sunburns! Keep your child's delicate skin safe in the sun with SwimZip's built-in UPF 50+ sun protection so there’s more time for enjoying the beach, lake or pool and less time worrying about harsh UV rays and reapplying sunscreen.
ADJUSTABLE HEAD AND CHIN STRAPS - Both the head strap and the chin strap are adjustable to easily create the best fit possible.
FULL OF FEATURES - Break away chin strap helps prevent choking. Side venting keeps heads cool. Wide brim for optimal protection.

IT FLOATS - Easily grab this hat if it ends up in the water. And the quick dry fabric will have it back and ready to use in a jiffy! (Corrosion resistant eyelets make this a great hat to take to the beach.)
WIDE RANGE OF COLOR OPTIONS - Pair your kid's sun hat perfectly with SwimZip sun protection rash guard swimwear sets and sunsuits.
